successes.title: The Light Phone
successes.description: A credit card-sized cell phone designed to be used as little as possible. The Light Phone is your phone away from phone.

Pledges.description: Thank you for helping make dreams come true. Seriously, thank you.
Light shirt, available exclusively on Kickstarter.

Light Book. We are designing  a book that documents the process of building the Light Phone. Including photos, drawings and essays, it will cover the entire story from ideation to insights into the manufacturing process.
Both a shirt and process book. This reward will ship in multiple parts. The Light shirt will ship in July of 2015, and the book will follow in June of 2016.

Early Bird Special: the Light Phone, shirt, process book and a limited edition (surprise) archival print solely for these first backers. This reward will ship in multiple parts. The Light shirt and print will ship in July of 2015. The phone will ship by May of 2016 and the book will follow in June of 2016.
The Light Phone! You will receive one of the very first Light Phones. It will come with a mini USB charger, and a SIM card preloaded with at least 500 minutes.

The Light Phone, a shirt and the process book. This is our Collector's Package. You will receive one of the first Light Phones, our exclusive Kickstarter shirt and the process book. This reward will ship in multiple parts. The Light shirt will ship in July of 2015. The phone will ship by May of 2016 and the book will follow in June of 2016.

2 Light Phones, 2 shirts and 1 process book. This is our Couple's Package, enjoy the light moments together.This reward will ship in multiple parts. The Light shirt will ship in July of 2015. The phone will ship by May of 2016 and the book will follow in June of 2016.

4 Light Phones, 4 shirts and 1 process book. This is our Family's package, enjoy the light moments together. This reward will ship in multiple parts. The Light shirt will ship in July of 2015. The phone will ship by May of 2016 and the book will follow in June of 2016.
